html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-04502022-04-29,  ,  ,  LAB,  ISC,  NRCAN,  TC, 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code (Respiratory Protective Equipment)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE (RESPIRATORY PROTECTIVE EQUIPMENT) in order to allow Canadian Standards Association Group certified equipment to be provided as an alternative to the United States National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health certified equipment in federally regulated workplaces where there is a risk of injury or disease due to exposure to an airborne hazardous substance and the equipment does not provide air.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0094 Publication Date: 2022-05-11
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code (Respiratory Protective Equipment)
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE (RESPIRATORY PROTECTIVE EQUIPMENT) in order to allow Canadian Standards Association Group certified equipment to be provided as an alternative to the United States National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health certified equipment in federally regulated workplaces where there is a risk of injury or disease due to exposure to an airborne hazardous substance and the equipment does not provide air.
